alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Lucas; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 5:13PM CST until March 05 at 5:45PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lucas County in south central Iowa... Southeastern Decatur County in south central Iowa... Wayne County in south central Iowa... * Until 545 PM CST. * At 512 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Leon, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corydon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for south central Iowa.
